General.Name: Arb Bhd
General.Description: ARB Berhad, provides enterprise resource planning (ERP) and Internet of Things (IoT) solutions in Malaysia. The company designs and develops cloud customized ERP solutions; integrates businesses' existing ERP system into cloud systems; and supports, troubleshoots, and implements cloud customized ERP system to ease migration from business existing system or for new cloud customized ERP system implementation. It also provides Cloud Cosec, a cloud-based fully automated secretarial service solution; and WeMeet, a virtual shareholders meeting platform. In addition, the company offers smart home solutions, which integrate a range of electrical appliances, centralized control, remote monitoring, and accessible through mobile devices and Windows operating system; professional electrical wire installation and home data network services; and smart home products and integration services. Further, it provides IoT system, engineering, procurement, commissioning, and management to property developers and contractors; designing, installation, testing, pre-commissioning, and commissioning of various IoT systems and devices, as well as integration of automated; and designing layout of the smarts hydroponic farm, which includes the procurement of sensors and surveillance cameras, as well as other relevant hardware. Additionally, the company engages in developing software that enables transfer of data; installation, testing, and commissioning of the hardware and software; and procurement, supply, and delivery of industrial building systems, as well as distributes mobile gadget accessories to end users through resellers, distributors, and retailers. It also offers data analytics, periodic maintenance, customer careline, online chat support, digital marketing, pre-installation, and warranty services. The company was formerly known as Aturmaju Resources Berhad and changed its name to ARB Berhad in April 2019. ARB Berhad was incorporated in 1997 and is based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
